document_data.name: Quiet Multitude
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Quiet Multitude''' was a religious organization in [[Zakhara]] whose members followed the teachings of [[Selan]], the Zakharan goddess of beauty.{{cite book/Land of Fate/Fortunes and Fates|30}}

The Quiet Multitude did not have a favored weapon or symbol.
document_data.Activities: [[Mystic (Zakhara)|Mystics]] of the Quiet Multitude worshiped Selan by meditating under the moonlight. As of [[1367 DR]], there were dozens of sub-sects of the Quiet Multitude across Zakhara, each with their own unique way of worshiping the goddess. The different sects usually did not get along with each other.
document_data.Base of Operations: Beginning in the mid 1200s [[DR]], the Quiet Multitude rapidly spread throughout all of Zakhara, creating unique sects within every major city on the continent.
